servers.name: mw2.tdt.net
servers.description: TDT - Only fully operational private server currently online, running Myth War II. Signing up requires referral from an active player, see https://mw2.tdt.net/article-262.html for instructions. Server is owned and managed by a Chinese individual named Wu Xiao Wei, also known as Snake-Quantou, uuclient, asyincio & rsyslogd. The origin of their server files is unknown.

servers.name: sj.51wgg.com
servers.description: Defunct Chinese Myth War II server which ran until 2018. They claimed to be reopening during 2019 and then later in 2021, which never ended up happening. No news since 2021.

discord.name: Myth War
discord.description: General community server for all things Myth War Online & Myth War II.

discord.name: Myth War Server
discord.description: Discord community for an ongoing effort in developing a compatible Myth War Online server from scratch. You can currently run your own local server, or log into a testing instance accessible by following instructions in the server. Very barebones for the time being, and unlikely to see meaningful progress in the near future. GitLab Repo: https://gitlab.com/wander-gr/mw-tools

subreddits.name: r/MythWar
subreddits.description: General subreddit for all things Myth War Online & Myth War II.

forums.name: Thunderized (Defunct)
forums.description: Web archive of the now-defunct Myth War encyclopedia from Thunderized Guild. Contains in-depth info on Myth War's major quests and system, mostly relevant to Myth War Online

forums.name: SpritWorld
forums.description: Old Myth War forum where apparently nobody knew how to spell the word "Spirit". Contains a few useful guides & information.

official.name: mythol.com
official.description: China - Closed Beta for Myth War Online.

official.name: mythonline.com.cn
official.description: China - Mainland China proxy access to mythol.com. Became a proxy of sj.gyyx.cn after mythol.com was trashed near the beginning of 2006.

official.name: sj.gyyx.cn
official.description: China - Secondary platform for Myth War Online distribution.

official.name: mythonline.com.tw
official.description: Taiwan - Taiwanese version for Myth War Online. Published by Taiwan Net(台灣網竣).

official.name: digiworld.co.jp/mythwar
official.description: Japan - Japanese version for Myth War Online. Published by DIGIWORLD.

official.name: mythwar.blog.digiworld.co.jp
official.description: Japan - Official blog platform for the Japanese release of Myth War Online.

official.name: 9458.com
official.description: Taiwan - Second website in preparation for Myth War II. Published by IGG's predecessor, 福州天盟數碼有限公司.

official.name: mythwaronline.com
official.description: North America - Initial website for Myth War Online's western release.

official.name: mw.igg.com
official.description: North America - Second iteration under IGG (SkyUnion, Ltd.).

official.name: mw2.igg.com
official.description: North America - Third iteration during Myth War II.
